description:
PRojects In a Controlled environment (PRINCE2) Foundation is a methodology used in Project Management to improve Project management skills. PRINCE2 Practitioner is the certification that enhances the skills required to manage the projects and handle risks efficiently. This PRINCE2 course content not only explains the benefits of the PRINCE2 methodologies, but also demonstrates the best way to achieve the PRINCE2 Practitioner certification. This course prepares participants to clear the PRINCE2 Practitioner Examination. The course has been developed by GreyCampus, an Accredited Training Organization by PEOPLECERT.

Take the first step towards becoming a PRINCE2 Practitioner certified professional by enrolling into this course.

How to become PRINCE2 Practitioner certified?

  1. Go through the course content and use the practice quizzes,case studies at the end of each chapter to test your understanding. Where needed, watch the videos again and refer the PRINCE2 manual to solidify your understanding.
  2. The PRINCE2 Practitioner certification exam booking can be facilitated by GreyCampus; PEOPLECERT administers the exam, and as per your convenience you can take it online. To take up the exam online you need to have a webcam and accept that you will follow the proctoring guidelines set by the examination authority.Â 

If you are a PMP credential holder looking to claim PDUs, doing this course will also helpful to claim 45 PDUs.

Please note that, the certification exam, PDU certificate and mock tests costs are not included in the price of the course.
title: Prince2 Practitioner Training
